subject: beautiful genius writers sarah hagi and claire carusillo
body:
i'm thankful new gawker is here starring friends of this newsletter/beautiful genius writers [sarah hagi](https://www.gawker.com/profile/sarah-hagi-1911902) and [claire carusillo](https://www.gawker.com/profile/claire-carusillo-72387829), among various other luminaries (kelly conaboy on [bathroom trash cans](https://www.gawker.com/culture/the-mystery-of-the-bathroom-trash-can) and also i will keep refreshing [this search](https://www.gawker.com/search?q=darcie%20wilder))! start by reading (on your phone, of course) "[ANY OFFLINE ACTIVITY COUNTS AS READING](https://www.gawker.com/culture/any-offline-activity-counts-as-reading)" and the modest proposal "[REPLACE ALL CHILD ACTORS WITH ADULTS IN MOTION-CAPTURE SUITS](https://www.gawker.com/celebrity/replace-all-child-actors-with-adults-in-motion-capture-suit)" (i will sign the [change.org](http://change.org)).

speaking of [spitting into each other's mouths](https://www.gawker.com/politics/cpac-crowd-spits-into-each-others-mouths), the episode of love island i watched last night had this challenge which was the most disgusting thing i have possibly ever seen in my life where couples passed the various ingredients (solid, liquid, and everywhere in between) for a roast dinner between each other's mouths and then reconstituted it on a plate and then i was more horrified to learn on slack that this is not some hellish one off in this season but a recurring challenge that is like two partners one plate or the dumbest possible [pasolini](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sal%C3%B2,_or_the_120_Days_of_Sodom), thanks i hate it!!!!
